name: fetch_latest_nav
description: Fetch Latest NAV. These APIs provide latest NAV information of all mutual funds in India from Association of Mutual Funds of India (AMFI).

apikey.desciption: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: fetch_historical_nav
description: Fetch Historical NAV. These APIs provide latest NAV information of all mutual funds in India from Association of Mutual Funds of India (AMFI).

date.desciption: The date you want to check.

SchemeName.desciption: Scheme name of it. All scheme names can be fetched by the function named 'fetch_all_scheme_names' in the same script.

SchemeType.desciption: Scheme type of it. All scheme types can be fetched by the function named 'fetch_all_scheme_types' in the same script.

MutualFundFamily.desciption: Mutual fund family of it. All mutual fund families can be fetched by the function named 'fetch_all_mutual_fund_families' in the same script.

SchemeCategory.desciption: Scheme category of it. Scheme categories can be fetched by the function named 'fetch_scheme_categories_by_scheme_type' with param scheme_type in the same script.

apikey.desciption: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: fetch_all_scheme_types
description: Fetch All Scheme Types. These APIs provide latest NAV information of all mutual funds in India from Association of Mutual Funds of India (AMFI).

apikey.desciption: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: fetch_all_scheme_names
description: Fetch All Scheme Names. These APIs provide latest NAV information of all mutual funds in India from Association of Mutual Funds of India (AMFI).

apikey.desciption: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: fetch_all_mutual_fund_families
description: Fetch All Mutual Fund Families. These APIs provide latest NAV information of all mutual funds in India from Association of Mutual Funds of India (AMFI).

apikey.desciption: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: fetch_scheme_categories_by_scheme_type
description: Fetch Scheme Categories By Scheme Type. These APIs provide latest NAV information of all mutual funds in India from Association of Mutual Funds of India (AMFI).

apikey.desciption: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.desciption: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
